title: certain apps notifications is not shown
content:
I have installed a security app called "YI Home" to handle all YI IoT devices.
In all of my NON-Google devices the apps notifications are shown in the appropriate timing,
ONLY on the Pixel device the app's notifications are not shown even though they are fired.

I have 2 more apps with the same weird behavior.

I already made sure that all settings (General device's & app specific) regarding the notifications enabling & etc. are all correctly configured. Moreover, I have tried disabling / enabling the "Adaptive Battery" functionality with no change.

Would appreciate any assistance in resolving the issue.
Thanks,
Oran
